channel.title: CVE Feed for codeSavory -- Knowledge Base documentation & wiki plugin – BasePress

item.title: CVE-2024-33588|2024-08-02T02:36:04.125Z -- codesavory -- knowledge%20base%20documentation%20%26%20wiki%20plugin%20%E2%80%93%20basepress
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in codeSavory Knowledge Base documentation & wiki plugin – BasePress.This issue affects Knowledge Base documentation & wiki plugin – BasePress: from n/a through 2.16.1.
